name: BugCLI252Test
description: Tests for handling ambiguous option names in Apache Commons CLI.

test_cases.description: Tests that an AmbiguousOptionException is thrown when an ambiguous option name is provided.

test_cases.name: testExactOptionNameMatch
test_cases.description: Tests that no exception is thrown when an exact option name match is provided.

name: DisablePartialMatchingTest
description: Tests for disabling partial matching in CommandLineParser.

test_cases.name: testDisablePartialMatching
test_cases.description: Tests that partial matching is disabled by creating a CommandLineParser with partial matching disabled and verifying that both 'debug' and 'extract' options are recognized.

test_cases.name: testRegularPartialMatching
test_cases.description: Tests regular partial matching by creating a CommandLineParser with default settings and verifying that only the 'debug' option is recognized.

name: BugCLI148Test

name: OptionsTest
description: Unit tests for the Options class in the Apache Commons CLI library, focusing on various functionalities like adding options, handling conflicts, and testing deprecated options.

test_cases.name: testAddConflictingOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of conflicting options to an Options object, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options to an Options object, ensuring the correct merging of option groups and options.

test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options to an Options object, expecting an IllegalArgumentException due to self-addition.

test_cases.description: Tests the handling of deprecated options, ensuring the correct behavior of toString and toDeprecatedString methods.

test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options with duplicate long names, ensuring the last added option description is retained.

test_cases.name: testLong

test_cases.description: Tests the addition of simple options and checking their presence in an Options object.

test_cases.description: Tests the presence of options with a null deprecation handler, ensuring correct behavior.

test_cases.name: hasOptionTest
test_cases.description: Tests the presence of options, ensuring deprecated options are reported correctly.

test_cases.name: noDeprecationHandlerTest
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of option values without a deprecation handler, ensuring correct behavior.

test_cases.name: testBadGetParsedOptionValue
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of bad input for parsed option values, ensuring exceptions are thrown correctly.

test_cases.name: testBuilder
test_cases.description: Tests the CommandLine builder functionality, ensuring arguments and options are added correctly.

test_cases.name: testBuilderNullArgs
test_cases.description: Tests the CommandLine builder functionality with null arguments, ensuring they are handled correctly.

test_cases.name: testBuilderNullOption
test_cases.description: Tests the CommandLine builder functionality with null options, ensuring they are handled correctly.

test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of option properties, ensuring properties are parsed and retrieved correctly.

test_cases.name: testGetOptionPropertiesWithOption
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of option properties using an Option object, ensuring properties are parsed and retrieved correctly.

test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of options from a CommandLine object created with a builder, ensuring options are managed correctly.

test_cases.name: testGetOptionsCtor
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of options from a CommandLine object created with a constructor, ensuring options are managed correctly.

test_cases.name: testNullOption
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of null options, ensuring null values are returned correctly.

name: OptionTest
description: Unit tests for the Option class in the Apache Commons CLI library.

methods.name: checkOption
methods.signature: void checkOption(Option, String, String, String, int, String, boolean, boolean, char, Class<?>, String, Boolean, String)

nested_classes.name: TestOption
nested_classes.description: Internal subclass of Option for testing purposes.

test_cases.name: testAddValue
test_cases.description: Tests the addValue and processValue methods of the Option class, ensuring they throw the expected exceptions.

test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when invalid option names are provided.

test_cases.description: Tests various configurations of the Option builder, ensuring the correct values are set.

test_cases.name: testClone

test_cases.name: testEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method of the Option class, ensuring it correctly compares Option instances.

test_cases.name: testGetValue
test_cases.description: Tests the getValue methods of the Option class, ensuring they return the correct values.

test_cases.name: testHasArgName
test_cases.description: Tests the hasArgName method of the Option class, ensuring it correctly identifies if an argument name is set.

test_cases.name: testHasArgs
test_cases.description: Tests the hasArgs method of the Option class, ensuring it correctly identifies if arguments are set.

test_cases.name: testHashCode
test_cases.description: Tests the hashCode method of the Option class, ensuring it generates different hash codes for different Option instances.

test_cases.name: testSerialization
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of the Option class, ensuring the converter is correctly handled.

test_cases.name: testSubclass
test_cases.description: Tests the clone method of the DefaultOption subclass, ensuring it correctly clones the instance.

test_cases.name: testTypeClass
test_cases.description: Tests the getType and setType methods of the Option class, ensuring they correctly handle the type.

test_cases.name: testTypeObject
test_cases.description: Tests the getType and setType methods of the Option class, ensuring they correctly handle the type when set as an Object.

test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the Option class, ensuring that the cloned object is not the same instance but has the same properties.

test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the Option class when the original object has empty values, ensuring the cloned object also has empty values.

test_cases.name: testCloneWithNullValues
test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the Option class when the original object has null values, ensuring the cloned object also has the same null values.
